ingredients: Graham crackers, broken into squares, for dipping
directions: Heat a cast-iron skillet over medium heat. Melt the butter in the skillet, add the nuts and toast until fragrant. Remove from the heat and sprinkle the chocolate chips evenly over the nuts. Spread the marshmallows over the chocolate chips. Place the skillet under the broiler until browned on top.
Serve in the skillet and use graham cracker squares for dipping.
